title: hand written font help
content:
Hello,  
 I’m currently working on a comic book and  
doing my own lettering by hand. I’d like to create my own font, using  
my own lettering (by hand, all caps), so when I type out my stories on  
the computer, I could print it out in my personalized font. I was  
hoping I could write out the alphabet ten times, so when I type out my  
font it would randomly select a different letter “A”, so as not to  
look too uniform, and more hand drawn. (i.e.: aaaaaaaaaa bbbbbbbbbb  
cccccccccc...etc.) Does this make sense? Is there any solution to this ?  
I would really appreciate some advice.  
Thanks.
